# Open Brick Lab - LLM URL Rules

Base URL:
https://openbrick.cogan.dev/

When generating a link for a specific brick, use this exact format:
https://openbrick.cogan.dev/?template=classic_brick&width={X}&length={Y}&height={Z}&scale={SCALE}

Parameter ranges:
- X (width): integer 1..10
- Y (length): integer 1..12
- Z (height): integer 1..9
- SCALE (scale): integer 95..105

Example:
https://openbrick.cogan.dev/?template=classic_brick&width=4&length=2&height=3&scale=101

If user values are out of range, clamp to nearest valid value.
